data.comment: The first-half is in progress. Brentford get the game underway.
The first-half has come to a close in Watford.
In the minute 46, James Linington blows to start the second-half. Watford with the kick-off.
Watford have been given a penalty at Vicarage Road...
Brentford are down to 10 men after Ethan Pinnock has been shown a red card.
In the minute 60, Goal! Watford take a 1-0 lead thanks to a Troy Deeney spot-kick..
The away team have replaced Sergi Canos with Charlie Goode. This is the first substitution made today by Thomas Frank.
An attacking Brentford player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
In the minute 63, The match is now all square at 1-1 thanks to a penalty from Ivan Toney.
Etienne Capoue is replacing Nathaniel Chalobah for Watford at Vicarage Road.
The away team replace Bryan Mbeumo with Marcus Forss.
In the minute 73, Watford make their second substitution with Stipe Perica replacing James Garner.
Christian Kabasele (Watford) has received a first yellow card.
Thomas Frank is making the team's third substitution at Vicarage Road with Emiliano Marcondes replacing Joshua Da Silva.
In the minute 86, Vladan Ivic (Watford) is making a third substitution, with Andre Gray replacing Jeremy Ngakia.
Troy Deeney (Watford) has received a yellow card from James Linington.
It's 1-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
William Troost-Ekong (Watford) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Watford's Ismaila Sarr has been booked in Watford.
